channel.description: The dnf Command Introduced in RHEL 8 Can use interchangeably with yum in RHEL yum is a soft link to the dnf utility. Requires the system to have access to either: a local or remote software repository a local installable package file. Subscription Management* (RHSM) service Available in the Red Hat Customer Portal Offers access to official Red Hat software repositories. Other web-based repositories that host packages are available You can also set up a local, custom repository on your system and add packages of your choice to it.
